long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raccoon is a browser tool that generates temporary email addresses, allowing you to sign up for websites and services without revealing your real email address. Protecting you from spam, phishing, and unwanted marketing emails.

Designed and developed by: https://x.com/rafaelmunozan
GitHub Repo: https://github.com/rafaelmunozan/Raccoon
